Package com.eteks.sweethome3d.plugin

Describes the super classes required to create Sweet Home 3D plug-ins.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HomePluginController
    A MVC controller for the home view able to manage plug-ins.
    Plugin
    The super class of a plug-in.
    PluginAction
    An action made available to application users through a plugin.
    PluginManager
    Sweet Home 3D plug-ins manager.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PluginAction.Property
    Enumeration of the various properties this action may define.

Package com.eteks.sweethome3d.plugin Description

Describes the super classes required to create Sweet Home 3D plug-ins.

A plug-in may consist of one or more actions that will be automatically added to the tool bar and menu bar of the home view, depending on whether the value of their TOOL_BAR and MENU properties.
